title: David Oath of the Horatii revolutionary context

content.question: Although the patron intended for the painting to promote loyalty to the state, the contemporary political climate caused viewers to interpret the work as

choices.label: a condemnation of foreign powers who occupied France
a revolutionary call to arms for those who opposed the monarchy
a criticism of the Catholic Church’s religious orthodoxy
an allegory about France’s moral obligation to colonize other countries

content.answer: a revolutionary call to arms for those who opposed the monarchy
